Title: Climbing Into Bed
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Cole Maliska, Craig Gore, Tim Walsh, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: When an undercover job goes south, Ruzek is investigated by a street deputy who will determine his future with the unit.
